import React, { Component, useState } from 'react' import styles from '../../ProfileBlocks.module.css' const RequestsCard = ({ requestsdata }) => (
{requestsdata.name}
{requestsdata.group}
{requestsdata.rating}
Тема ВКР:
{requestsdata.topic}
Тип ВКР:
{requestsdata.type}
Дополнительно:
{requestsdata.additional}
); export default RequestsCard;
